metadata.name: 'Higher Love' 2022
metadata.description:
Children often get lost with the magical qualities of things that appear to float that we as adults often take for granted. From capturing the fun of blowing bubbles to dandelion seeds, this series of work aims to capture these fleeting moments of fascination and joy children experience, when they learn to figure out the world around them.  
 
Each image is named after the music that was playing during the shoot. The song playing for this one was 'Higher Love' by Whitney Houston and Kygo. Chosen by my daughter, who was also the model.  
 
Photography and Digital 3D Photoshop and Maya RGB 4724 x 4724
